reviews.comments: Excelente departamento.
Todo impecables, ubicación, departamento, entorno , etc

El apartamento es precioso y tiene una localización perfecta, en una de las esquinas más notables de San Telmo. La comunicación con Grisel fue muy ágil y nos mandó una guía con info muy útil para la llegada y la estancia. Lo recomendaría sin dudarlo!
Es un departamento amplio y cómodo, muy bien equipado. Ubicado en el corazón de San Telmo desde donde se camina buena parte del casco histórico de la ciudad. La anfitriona atenta y amable.

Bien ubicada y a buen precio.

El apartamento se ve igual como en las fotos.

Estubimos en el departamento de Grisel y todo fue lo mas perfecto. En el corazón de San Telmo yo y mis amigos nos sentimos como en casa todo el tiempo. Ya pienso en volver con mi familia muy pronto. Grisel fue muy amable y nos ayudo cuando precisamos, hizo el checkin tarde porque teniamos um vuelo complicado y estubo siempre en contacto. Super lo recomendo.

La comunicación con Grisel fue excelente antes, durante y después del viaje sobre todo a través de (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN). Se mostró muy disponible en todo momento y nos ayudó en lo que necesitamos. Nos acompañó incluso a coger el taxi de vuelta al aeropuerto. El amplio apartamento está muy bien situado en el Centro de San Telmo, un barrio especialmente bullicioso por las noches por lo que no hay que temer al ruido. Está muy bien comunicado con el resto de la ciudad y se encuentra de todo lo necesario a pocos pasos. Hay una abundante oferta de restaurantes, tiendas y ocio, sobre todo los domingos, cuando tiene lugar en la calle el animado mercadillo. El bonito mercado de San Telmo está muy cerca por lo que se puede comprar fruta, verdura y carne fresca. No hay que perderse la exquisita panadería francesa que está en el interior. La casa tiene mucho encanto, sobre todo el salón comedor. Es mejorable la calidad de internet y el equipamiento de cocina y baño, pero eso no ha impedido que pasemos una excelente estancia, hasta el punto de que nos hubiéramos quedado más días. Muchas gracias Grisel por todo. Recomendaremos tanto el barrio como el apartamento a nuestros amigos y nos encantaría volver pronto.
reviews.response: Hola Domingo, gracias por tu lindo comentario. Espero puedas volver! un abrazo

reviews.comments:
Fue un viaje hermoso, el departamento es increíble, gracias a su espacio, limpio, ubicación, y comodidades. Las camas super confortables, el departamento super silencioso, algo valiosisimo en esta ciudad!
La cocina super practica, y acogedora, su mesa desayunador, un sueno!
Andrew y Grisel muy amables y dispuestos siempre! Espero volver a este departamento cuando vuelva a Buenos Aires!
reviews.response: Gracias sol por tu lindo comentario. Espero verte nuevamente por Buenos Aires!

reviews.comments: El departamento es maravilloso, es tal cual como aparece en las fotografías, muy cómodo para dos parejas. El barrio también es excelente, seguro y con muchos lugares donde ir a comer y entretenerse, con una ubicación privilegiada de la feria de San Telmo. Nuestra anfitriona, muy amablemente nos coordino el traslado desde el aeropuerto al departamento, en donde ella nos estaba esperando, nos paso una guía turística de buenos aires muy practica y nos entrego todos los datos que le fuimos solicitando a lo largo de nuestra estadía. Nos recomendó los barrios que debíamos visitar y nos indico como movilizarnos, nos paso la tarjeta de transporte y otra con una serie de descuento en diversos lugares.

Everything about this place was exactly as expected. We even got to experience the very popular San Telmo Féria (outdoor market). The unit is right in the center of it all and walking distance to everything -- shopping, grocery, coffee shops, and more. Grisel was an excellent host and had mapped out everything we needed in a fantastic "visitors book" with tons of recommendations. I can't speak more highly about Grisel and her unit. We loved it!

Great accommodation for 3 people - clean and tidy. Good value for money. Good location close to all bars and restaurants but be aware that it will be noisy!! You can’t have it all....

 If I was to be picky a couple of things could be improve:
> not enough kitchen cooking ustensiles and pantry stock
> average bed matressss and pillows 

Overall a good stay! No issue at all and good communication with Grisel.

Our Host Grisel was very responsive during our booking phase, and met us upon arrival at her wonderful place.  She filled us in on many local restaurants, shops, and transportation tips.  The apartment is clean, with modern amenities, but in a vintage building giving you that "old world feel".  We loved exploring the neighborhood, and venturing out to see the rest of Buenos Aires.  I would highly recommend her place and stay here again.

Grisel's apartment is well-located in beautiful San Telmo. She was very prompt and helpful with recommendations about what to check out in Buenos Aires. Her apartment is comfortable and stylishly decorated. We really enjoyed our stay there and highly recommend it!

This was our second stay at Grisel's fantastic apartment, which has now become our home away from home. Grisel is the most organised and efficient host, she made us feel so welcome and even greeted us with little medialunas upon arrival. Such a lovely thought after a long journey. We come to Buenos Aires for a year for a work trip and we would never look any further than Grisel's home. If you are looking for an authentic Argentine experience then this is the place for you. Thank you for a wonderful stay. We will see you next year!
Ps. Don't forget to stand on the balcony on Sunday morning and watch the market traders setting up, it's a magical sight.

Despite a welcome which was cold because of a delay of (only) 15min (the arrival was planned between 4 and 4.30 pm, we arrived at 4.45...oups) of ourself (with no internet connection it was difficult to aware the host), the flat is very nice: cosy and spacious, the emplacement will let you discover BA without any issues. Perfect for two couples. 
I definitively recommend this flat!!!

Grisel was very helpful with our check-in and check-out times. The place is very clean and is just like the pictures but better! Really enjoyed staying there and the location is perfect. There is a nice market on Sunday's and we got a very nice view of it from the balcony.

Amazing, everything was like i hope it would be.
The house was clean and very well decorated.
The location its perfect, the neighborhood full of life but not noisy.
Juan, was already waiting to welcome us, he was very professional and explained all the details.
Easy Check-in and check-out.
I would recommended to everyone without hesitation.
Thanks Grisel and Juan for recieve us and allow us to have this amazing experience in the beautiful city of Buenos Aires.

The place is near a bakery/restaurant called "la continental" wich you can have breakfest or grab a pizza at night. It is also near café san juan and other nice places. Its near puerto madero and plaza de mayo! The apartment is exactly like the photos. Very clean and comfy
O local é perfeito! Próximo a ótimos bares, restaurantes, sorveterias, fácil de acessar o transporte público... e o apartamento de Grisel é excelente!!!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Julio por tu comentario. Me alegro que te haya gustado. Un placer conocerlo. Saludos cordiales!

reviews.comments: We really enjoyed our stay and we're pleased of all the little helpful efforts en plus. We enjoyed to have a lot of classy space and these two sepearate bathrooms. The location was perfect for us. Close to our conference and just around the corner of our most preferred restaurants.

The San Telmo apartment was on the famous Defensa St and it had 2 balconies that faced the street. This was great for people watching! The kitchen was very well equipped and the bedrooms were very cosy. The heating was very good and the showers had continuous flow hot water.
Grisel is a professional manager of the property and you can feel reassured that the apartment is pretty much exactly as described on the Airbnb website.

Regards,

Lesley (Melbourne, Australia)
reviews.response: Thanks a lot for the nice review and thanks for the tips as well. It was lovely to have you as guests!

reviews.comments: A lovely apartment, close to cafes and restaurants. An easy walk to other areas of Buenos Aires of interest to a tourist. Grisel was available to answer questions or assist when needed, which was appreciated.

She was an amazing host. The place is in a great central location and she gives you the lay out of the area when you get there.  The place was clean and the shower never runs out of hot water. If you stand on the balcony there's a great breeze asy night.
reviews.response: Thanks a lot for the lovely review. I'm happy you enjoyed your stay and thanks for staying here.

reviews.comments: Best located spot in the area with a real classic and comfortable place to rest from the living streets you can have a good look down to from the balcony.

This place is great! Exactly how it looked in the photos. Perfect location in a very cool neighborhood, lots of space, and really cool look. Big and updated kitchen so we could make breakfast in the morning then go walk beautiful Buenos Aires. Only issue was spotty/no wifi a couple of days. But Grisel was very accommodating, helping us out with an extra guest and generally being a great host. Definitely recommend!

We congratulated ourselves on our good fortune in selecting a perfect location in the historic San Telmo neighborhood.  The 100-year-old building overlooked lively Avenida Defensa, but the condo was quiet and as lovely as the photos, which showcase a collection of unique art.  Grisel arrange our transport to and from the airport, and was there to meet us an bid farewell.  She was always ready to help.  We recommend Cafe Rivas on Estado Unidos, also Origen on Humberto Primo, and the modestly priced desayunos of medialunas and cafe dulce [and sometimes fresh OJ which are everywhere and not to be missed. Also the Saturay morning market mention in Grisel's guidebook.  Great peaches!

O apartamento é realmente o que as fotos demonstram, ótimo para se passar alguns dias e também muito confortável!
A localização é priveligiada, é possível conhecer 80% dos pontos turísticos a pé, sem precisar gastar com táxi ou metro (que também são muito fácies de se conseguir). O bairro é bem bohemio com diversas opções de bares e restaurantes!
reviews.response:
Hola Alexandre.
Muchas gracias por tu lindo comentario. Me alegro de que hayan disfrutado la estadia. Y pido disculpas por el aire que no funcionaba, fue algo de ultimo momento. Gracias por la comprension.

reviews.comments:
We enjoyed a wonderful home away from home experience at Grisel's beautiful apartment. 

We had a lovely warm welcome from Grisel who was very flexible and  responsive throughout the trip. We were there for over two weeks so she even arranged for it to be cleaned half way through, which was a lovely touch. 

You'll find a very handy and extensive guide to the city which Grisel has carefully compiled, and it was full of great suggestions and non-touristy tips.

The beds were really comfortable with lovely soft sheets! We both slept really well. 

The kitchen is pretty basic but as you are in the heart of the action in San Telmo - there is no need/desire to cook much.

We had a fantastic stay and I would absolutely recommend Grisel's apartment to anyone wanting a true Buenos Aires experience.
reviews.response: Thanks a lot for the lovely comment! Hope to see again.

reviews.comments:
Just finished a most enjoyable 5 night stay at Grisel's "French Classic" apartment in San Telmo--it was delightful.  As others have reviewed, it was just as pictured--neat and clean, spacious and charming with a definite French feel.  While the unit is on the 3rd floor, an old-fashioned grilled elevator (which operates fast and efficiently) takes you right to the apartment's front door.  The apartment's 2 bedrooms and 2 baths, the well-equipped kitchen, and the large living room and dining room make this place a great choice for a short or long stay.   Although there were just two of us, it would definitely be plenty roomy for 2 couples.  Grisel was a fine host, very responsive to our advance questions, and provided a wealth of information about the neighborhood, its restaurants, bars, shops, sights, customs and suggestions well before we arrived, giving us lots of time to plan for a great visit to B.A.  Grisel's helper, Andrew, actually greeted us upon arrival and provided an excellent orientation to the apartment as well as further specifics about the San Telmo area and answered any questions we might have had.  The apartment's location on Defensa puts it right in the heart of San Telmo, which is gentrified enough that it's full of great cafes and shops, a place where visitors won't feel unsafe, but still a very authentic section of B.A., with cobblestone streets, old buildings full of character, and regular people who live there.  As active as the area was, the apartment was pleasantly quiet--always nice to return to after a busy day of touring the city.
Thank you, Grisel, for making our first trip to B.A. such a happy and memorable one.  We hope it won't be our last and will definitely look forward to staying with you again.
Lovely Apartment and we appreciated Giesel arranging transport to and from the Airport.

Difficile de trouver mieux comme emplacement dans San Telmo avec la rue Defensa qui dévient piétonne le dimanche avec tous les stands d'artisanat.
L'appartement est spacieux, calme, bien équipé et l'arrivée avec l'ascenseur de l'époque ne fait que rendre le lieu encore plus authentique.
L'accueil de Grisel est on ne peut plus sympathique et professionnel. On serait bien rester encore plus longtemps que la semaine déjà super agréable.

Grisel was very welcoming when we got to the apartment, she gave us tips on how to get around the city and gave us several adresses of good restaurants. 
The apartment is very beautiful and very clean, albeit a bit cold because of the central heat. It is also very well located (walking distance from Placa de Mayo and Av. 9 du Julio, and there is a great market on Calle Defensa on Sundays). 
We loved our stay there, and would definitely stay there again.

Foi nossa primeira viagem a Buenos Aires e nossa primeira experiência através da Airbnb. Inicialmente estávamos apreensivos, mas tudo correu bem. Grisel foi muito atenciosa, providenciou transporte do aeroporto até o apartamento, bem como estava a nossa espera e nos passou orientações oportunas. O apartamento era o que esperávamos e passamos dias agradáveis nas capital Portenha. Tivemos sorte de estarmos presente nas comemorações dos 200 anos de Independência da Nação Argentina.   Nosso obrigado a anfitriã por tudo.

Grisel was great from booking to the last minute we stayed at the apartment in San Telmo. She could not be present at check in because our flight was delayed and she had other commitments, but sent his sister who was very kind and explained us everything we needed to know about the functioning of the apartment and the building. The apartment was very charming and comfortable, we really felt at home. The experience was very nice and we will come back for sure.
reviews.response: Thanks a lot for your nice review. Hope you can come back soon!

reviews.comments: When I arrived in San Telmo I was met by Andrew who very carefully and clearly explained everything about the apartment and gave tips on staying in Buenos Aires. Grisel was always very helpful and thoughtful and even had extra heating for the colder weather! The apartment is lovely; old and charming just like San Telmo. It is very comfortable, safe and a pleasant place to relax. I loved the balconies and the view of Calle Defensa.

Grisels place is exactly as shown in the photos. It is beautiful and has a very vintage feel particularly the elevator. Grisel was overall an accomodating host, when she wasn't able to greet us for check in because of work, she got Andrew to sort us out. The beds were comfortable, and the place was nicely furnished.

There was abit of a hiccup with the pick from the airport when arriving in Buenos Aires, but besides that everything else was smooth, Grisel was flexible with check out times and so forth and very informative about what we can do and where to do our laundry.

San telmo is a lovely bohemian, artsy neighborhood. Too bad we weren't there for the weekend when the neighborhood is bustling. We would definitely recommend staying at Grisel's.

This apartment in San Telmo is just perfect! Amazing location, right in the heart of a very lively area with plenty of bars and cafes near by (for which Grisel can give fantastic suggestions). It was very large, 2 big bedrooms and bathrooms so very comfortable for 2 couples or family. Grisel was very lovely, easy to communicate with and gave plenty of advice of how to make the best or your time in BA. Stay here!

If you want to have a fancy experience then San Telmo is not the right place. I loved the aera, it's charming atmosphere and the "smell of Tango"  around the corner ... The flat is spacious and gives you the feeling of living in another century. It's an authentic place.
Everything was perfect. The apartment is located in the heart of San Telmo area which mean an easy access to antique shops and the beautiful traditional Tango a few blocks from the apartment.
위치가 너무나 좋았다. 부모님과 함께한 여행이라 택시를 많이 이용했지만 혼자 여행이었다면 걸어서 충분히 다녔을 거라 생각한다. 깨끗하고 큰 불편함 없이 지냈다.

What a restful and beautiful stay. Grisel was so helpful and accommodating when our first flight was cancelled. She even helped arrange airport transportation. The apartment is incredible and was in a perfect location to enjoy both San Telmo, but the entire city of Buenos Aires.
reviews.response: Thanks for the lovely review and for choosing to stay at my place!!

reviews.comments: My friends and i had a great stay in BA. The apartment is located in heart of San Telmo, very spacious for 4 people and well equipped, everthing was spotless. We had smooth check-in and check-out. 100% recommend!
reviews.response: Thank you for the nice review. Sorry I couldnt meet you. Regards!!

reviews.comments: The location was great, with balconies overlooking all the action on La Defensa. We comfortably fit two couples with the luxury of having a bathroom/shower for each. Grisel was professional, punctual and gave us good tips about the neighborhood and city in general. We had a great time.

Not only was this  impeccably designed apartment an absolute dream nestled inside an historic building, we could not have been in a better location in San Telmo! Literally right in the heart of this historic neighborhood on Defensa street, we were walking distance to many of BA's best restaurants and a stone's throw from charming, checkered-tiled bars established in the 30s. 

Although our host was not the friendliest (we were 45 minutes late checking in the first day with circumstances outside of our control and unable to reach Grisel due to no wifi unfortunately), she did provide an extensive book of all the who, what, where, when, why of BA which was very helpful.

Loved loved loved our experience at The Gallery and highly recommend to anyone visiting BA!

We had a great week in the Gallery. Grisel was really helpful and easy to reach. The apartment is gorgeous and classic. It was really clean and quiet but still in the heart of it all. The great kitchen made it easy for us to stay there with our children who tire of restaurants. We'd love to come back again!
reviews.response:
Dear Jenny,
Thanks you for your lovely review and for being such great guests. Hope to see you again!!

reviews.comments: The apartment was spotless when we arrived and the décor of the apartment is excellent. I loved having the two bathrooms, which were both big and well-appointed. The location is excellent, you are right in the heart of San Telmo close to great bars and restaurants. The two balconies over the street are great for having an afternoon drink and watching the world go by.
reviews.response: Heinz, Thank you for choosing my place for your stay. and for the nice review!!

reviews.comments:
Grisel provided us with a lot of information prior to and during our stay which was very helpful. San Telmo is a lively part of town with lots of bars and is close to some tourist attractions. BA is HUGE, so it would be impossible to find a place close to everything. 
The actual apartment is very nice and charming, but old. We found one of the beds too small for two people. One of the four of us had to sleep on the couch (not a big deal for our family). On a very hot Summer day, one of the AC units did not work very well, so half of the apartment was almost unbearably warm. Luckily for us, that was only one day during our visit. I would still recommend staying here :)
reviews.response: Hi Nicole. Sorry to learn that the bed was too small for you and the A/C didn't work as expected. The fact that the apt is in an old building is one of charm things about it actually and people love it. The beds are the size it says in the listing (one is a queen and the other is a double), maybe good for 2 couples but not for a couple and their 2 children. As to the A/c there must have been something that went wrong with it during your stay, I'm sorry I couldnt know it but after you left.

reviews.comments: Belíssimo apartamento, muito confortável e espaçoso. Está localizado bem no meio de san Telmo, perto de tudo, numa rua movimentada. Grisel foi muito atenciosa e disposta a ajudar com qualquer detalhe. Muito obrigado!

Home was perfect and the photos are on point.  I loved the kitched and stayed in the kitchen most of my time in the home.  The apartment is quiet and super clean. I didn't need the AC or watch TV. Love having the subte card available.  I will stay there again.

Cheers,
Bill
reviews.response: Thanks for lovely review and for recommending my place to friends. I will definitely take your suggestion of offering renters to have the fridge stocked, it's a great idea! Thanks!! Look forward to seeing you again.

reviews.comments:
Grisel is the perfect Airbnb host. Even before ariving to BA we felt taken care of... The flat is perfect for two couples and we really enjoyed the perfect location for 1. time visitors in this great city. 
I hope that flat will be available when we return to BA....!

Grisel was, quite simply, an amazing host. She made us feel hugely welcome in her beautiful flat and was extremely generous with her advice on how to get around and what to do in Buenos Aires. She was easily available for us to contact her if we had any problems. Grisel also arranged our taxis to and from the airport, which was very helpful indeed. Myself and my boyfriend loved staying here. Thanks again Grisel!

I arrived on the red eye from Miami. I had given Grisel an estimated arrival time to the apartment of 7am but I calculated the time wrong. My flight arrived at 5am, I sent her an email and text message as soon as I got out of the plane but her response never got to me. I arrived at the apartment around 5:45am, she was gracious enough to let me in and explained everything even at this early hour. 
The apartment is comfortable, inviting and it reminded me a lot of paris. I would stay here again for sure and would recommend this place as a base for anyone who is visiting Buenos Aires.

Grisel was very accommodating, we felt at home away from home. The apartment was spacious, clean and cozy. The neighborhood was close to restaurants, shops and right on the corner of the Mafalda bench.  Which was a recognition to the author.
reviews.response:
Dear Antonio,
Thanks so much for choosing my apt for your stay. It was a pleasure having you stay there. and so happy to know you enjoyed it.

reviews.comments: Grisel was a wonderful host. She met us very early in the morning and was very thorough about the neighborhood, the apartment, and everything else. She supplies you with a book with great recommendations. She was very attentive and available. The space was so beautiful and in a great location. We truly enjoyed our stay.
reviews.response:
Dear Meredith,
thanks a lot for your nice words. It was nice having you stay at the apt. Kind regards.

reviews.comments: This airbnb experience was fantastic. Grisel is a lovely and accommodating hostess, making sure that we understood the ins and outs of not only the apartment, but also the city at large. The apartment is as luxurious as the pictures make it seem (very clean and comfortable too), and the location is prime. I would recommend this Airbnb again and again!

French Classic in San Telmo was a perfect place for two tango dancing couples. We felt like being at home and safe in a perfectly equiped appartment in the heart of BsAs. Although being in an area with many restaurants and bars we also used the perfectly equiped kitchen p.ex. on the 24th december when no restaurants were open. Supermarkets are nearby, a bakery is just across the street. Grisel has established a guide which helps with all necessary questions and needs. But she is also always reachable in case any questions are open.  Many attractions and milongas are in walking distance. Others you can easily reach by taxi or public transport. We do recommend this place very much and thank Grisel for her hospitaliy. We will definitely come back!

My family and I had such a great time at this lovely place. The location of the apartment is great, San Telmo is full of restaurants and bars and the market on Sunday is amazing. 
The apartment is wonderful, a really nice place where you feel like home. You can relax from the hectic Buenos Aires. 
We really recommend this place and Grisel was such a nice host!! Thank you very much! I hope we can come back some time :)

You couldn't possibly ask for a better space or location! The home is gorgeous, spacious, luxurious, and steps from the best of San Telmo. Grisel is extremely communicative and has tons of recommendations for enjoying the city! I would love to stay here again!

This apartment is wonderful, we would highly recommend it! Grisel is a very accommodating host, her guide to the city invaluable, the location of the apartment fantastic, beautiful interiors and old elevator, guide books on hand, comfy beds and luxurious linen. Two couples could stay here happily.

Grisel's place was beautiful. It has very high ceilings and is quite spacious. The location is the best in San Telmo - right on Defensa which is where the weekend street market is.

This area also has a lot of nice restaurants and is quite close to Puerto Madero.

I really enjoyed my stay at this apartment. I wanted to extend but unfortunately, it was rented to someone else before I had the chance to officially put this thru.

Very nice stay in this fantastic flat, it has everything you need to live just like at home.  Despite only two days there, I had a rich and varied taste of life in Buenos Aires.  Grisel gave me good info regarding restaurants (she was on key!!) and a local "milonga".  A great thing in this place is that you can walk to main attractions and shopping areas.  I really enjoyed my stay and highly recommend this comfortable place.

This apartment is in the perfect location in San Telmo, very secure and felt very safe. Grisel met us on time as arranged and showed us everything we needed to know.  There are guide books for the area and Buenos Aires which helped a lot.  She also took us out to a milonga / tango evening which was great fun. We would stay here again if we come back to Buenos Aires

Beautiful 2 bedroom apartment, large, spacious, airy, well appointed, comfortable.  

Right on Defensa which is the street that turns into a huge market on Sundays - 30 minutes from Palermo by cab (in traffic) - close to La Boca.

Very prompt and helpful service from Grisel the owner - apartment was clean and she was able to meet us when we got in very early in the morning.

This was a wonderful place and I would recommend it to anyone.  Very reliable WIFI.
